testcase.name: Given I am on the Gillette website
When I search for "Razor" using the search option
Then I should see "Results For Razor'" at the top of the search results

testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the display of Gillette MACH3 Turbo under products list
testcase.name: Given I am on the Gillette website

testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the display of Gillette MACH3 Turbo under products list
testcase.name: When I hover on from the top navigation

testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the display of Gillette MACH3 Turbo under products list
testcase.name: And I choose "MACH3" under "By Brands" from the drop-down

testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the display of Gillette MACH3 Turbo under products list
testcase.name: Then I should see "Gillette MACH3 Turbo" under the products list

testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the display of Gillette MACH3 Turbo under products list
testcase.name: Scenario: Verify the display of Gillette MACH3 Turbo under products list
